archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Inkoopsysteem
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Een systeem dat het inkopen van producten alsook het beheren van leveranciers en contracten ondersteunt.

properties.value: SAP Supplier Relationship Management (http://www1.sap.com/netherlands/solutions/business-suite/srm/index.epx), Oracle Fusion Procurement (http://www.oracle.com/us/products/applications/fusion/fusion-procurement-170892.html), Oracle PeopleSoft Supplier Relationship Management (http://www.oracle.com/us/products/applications/peoplesoft-enterprise/srm/053337.html)
